PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Using the COLOR field, this keyword is colored pink instead of the normal keyword color.
Increases attack damage of this card. NL Whenever unblocked damage is dealt, transfer one less #y${modID}:LV to the target and set this card's XP to one less the target's #y${modID}:XP.
Your next #yAttack will gain equivalent #y${modID}:XP. NL Enemies deal equivalent extra damage. NL Stolen #yStrength is converted into #y${modID}:LV.
KR-inflected creatures take damage whenever you lose HP or Temp HP. NL KR cannot kill.
A power that triggers an effect after a certain number of cards have been played.
Triggers an effect after a certain number of cards have been played.
A unique effect that occurs when a #yCountdown reaches 0.
Play this card while disregarding any conditions for playability. NL If a card is persevered, add an #Trapped copy of the card to your hand.
Critical cards have a bonus effect when in the middle of your hand or #yPersevered
Prevent the next time you would lose HP from Attacks.
Receive 50% more damage from non-Attacks.
Attempt to #ySteal any Block and any buffs the enemy didn't start with. Strength and enemy #y${modID}:LV is converted into player #y${modID}:LV.
Attempt to #Copy any buffs the enemy has. Strength and enemy #y${modID}:LV is converted into player #y${modID}:LV.
#y${modID}:XP which cannot be lost.
#y${modID}:XP which is transferred upon dealing unblocked attack damage.
#yTrapped cards cannot be played, even by #y${modID}:Persevere effects. NL #yTrapped cards cause you to lose energy equal to their cost when drawn.
Any card containing "Strike" in their name.
Any [E] used not playing cards. (Such as Void, or unspent energy at the end of turn)
Escape from a non-boss combat after 12 cards have been played. NL Receive no rewards.
If this enemy is attacked, they will instead gain #y${modID}:Betrayed.
This enemy gains twice as much #y${modID}:LV when attacked.
This card deals non-attack damage and is uneffected by Block modifiers.
Total enemy attack damage is greater or equal to your current HP.
Effect triggers when you obtain this card.
